```{r figRef-tabRef, include=FALSE}
figRef <- local({
    tag <- numeric()
    created <- logical()
    used <- logical()
    function(label, caption){
        i <- which(names(tag) == label)
        if (length(i) == 0){
            i <- length(tag) + 1
            tag <<- c(tag, i)
            names(tag)[length(tag)] <<- label
            used <<- c(used, FALSE)
            names(used)[length(used)] <<- label
            created <<- c(created, FALSE)
            names(created)[length(created)] <<- label
        }
        if (!missing(caption)){
            created[label] <<- TRUE
            paste0(caption)
        } else{
            used[label] <<- TRUE
            paste0(tag[label])
        }
    }
})

tabRef <- local({
    tag <- numeric()
    created <- logical()
    used <- logical()
    function(label, caption){
        i <- which(names(tag) == label)
        if (length(i) == 0){
            i <- length(tag) + 1
            tag <<- c(tag, i)
            names(tag)[length(tag)] <<- label
            used <<- c(used, FALSE)
            names(used)[length(used)] <<- label
            created <<- c(created, FALSE)
            names(created)[length(created)] <<- label
        }
        if (!missing(caption)){
            created[label] <<- TRUE
            paste0(caption)
        } else{
            used[label] <<- TRUE
            paste0(tag[label])
        }
    }
})
```
